reasoning: SIDS incidence among infants 1 month to <1 year age: ~0.5-1.5 per 1000 live births globally, approximately 40 per 100k person-years in the infant population. Well-documented by vital statistics registries. Geographic variation reflects differences in safe sleep practices, healthcare access, and surveillance capacity.
source: WHO Child Mortality Database and Vital Statistics Registries (2005)
